author: Cortex XSOAR

classifier.description: Classifies FireEye Email Security Alerts as Phishing Alerts incident type.
classifier.name: FireEye Email Security - Phishing Alerts - Classifier

commands.description: Lists the blocked sender domain by type.
commands.name: fireeye-ex-list-blockedlist

commands.description: Searches and retrieves the details of a single alert.
commands.name: fireeye-ex-get-alert-details

commands.description: Searches and retrieves FireEye EX alerts based on several filters.
commands.name: fireeye-ex-get-alerts

commands.description: Gets artifacts metadata for the specified UUID.
commands.name: fireeye-ex-get-artifacts-metadata-by-uuid

commands.description: Lists the allowed sender domain by type.
commands.name: fireeye-ex-list-allowedlist

commands.description: Downloads malware artifacts data for the specified UUID as a zip file.
commands.name: fireeye-ex-get-artifacts-by-uuid

commands.description: Releases and deletes quarantined emails. This is not available when Email Security is in Drop mode.
commands.name: fireeye-ex-release-quarantined-emails

commands.description: Deletes quarantined emails. This is not available when Email Security is in Drop mode.
commands.name: fireeye-ex-delete-quarantined-emails

integration.description: FireEye Email Security (EX) series protects against breaches caused by advanced email attacks.
integration.name: FireEye Email Security

playbook.description:
This playbook blocks domains using FireEye Email Security.
The playbook checks whether the FireEye Email Security integration is enabled, whether the Domain input has been provided and if so, blocks the domain.
playbook.name: Block Domain - FireEye Email Security

playbook.description: This playbook retrieves a specified EML/MSG file directly from FireEye Email Security or Central Management.
playbook.name: Get Email From Email Gateway - FireEye

description: FireEye Email Security series protects against breaches caused by advanced email attacks.
name: FireEye Email Security (EX)
readme: <!-- Currently holds the incident type for FE CM, will be edited when an integration will be added -->
